parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: Row number; this is a 0-based index

title: IBomTable.GetRowHeight
description: Gets the specified row height in meters.

parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: Row number; this is a 0-based index

returns: Height of the specified row in meters
remarks:
Before you use any of the IBomTable methods, activate the BOM table using
IBomTable::Attach3
. After you finish getting BOM data, use
IBomTable::Detach
to deactivate the table.
